command: cat input | xargs -I PLACEHOLDER sh -c 'DIR="/tmp/$(date +%s)"; mkdir -p ${DIR}; /home/op/go/bin/katana -u PLACEHOLDER -ct 15s -s "breadth-first" -iqp -f url -o ${DIR}/result.txt -sr -srd ${DIR}/responses -fs fqdn; cat ${DIR}/result.txt | anew output/result.txt; find ${DIR}/responses -type f -exec mv {} output/ \;'
